text: Hello
Hello. How are you?
I am good.  Have you ever had a hit like this one?
No, I have not. I'm not really sure what to do. Maybe ask you to donate some of your earnings? Is that right?
I guess we have to decide if we are going to donate at least some of our rewards to a good cause
That is what I figured. It doesn't give you very clear instructions. All I know is that we have to at least take 10 chat turns lol
That should be fairly easy.  Did you check out the Save the Children charity?
I have seen it. Would you like to donate? I am always willing to donate to the kids.
I personally donate to the kids.  I have 12 grandchildren and I know that if I had any special needs for them.  I would need help.  So since I have been blessed I still donate.

Aaaawww...thats really good. I always donate to childrens hospital. My 4 yr old daughter is former 23 weeker and is also a cancer survivor. She was 2 yrs cancer free last month! So, I've been blessed as well as her. How much would you like to donate? I think we have to come to an agreement?
I think since we are willing to donate than, it should be an easy  second half.  How much are you willing to donate?
It should be lol...Well, I think maybe 50 cents?
I was thinking $1.  It is a two dollar reward.  I think? But if we both give .50, I guess that would be $1.
Ok that sounds good to me. I think we have to chat 10 times each to end the hit.
So this is my seventh turn. We have 3 more
yes we do. How old is your youngest grandchild? Where are you from?
He is 3 months old and we live in Las Vegas.  How about you?
aaawww...babies are sweet. I have an 18 yr old daughter who started college on Monday and my 4 yr old. We live in Indiana.
I originally came from Chicago.   What part of Indiana?
Oh ok..We live in Indianapolis. Just bought a house on the Southeast side. My husband has family in South Chicago.
I guess we are done.  Nice chatting.
Yes we are....Have a great night
